items.content: New mechanism to the game: low, regular and captain monsters level `30+` killed by at least `80%` of damage inflicted from single target attacks and skills will have an increased experience and drop rate.
The experience and drop rate increase is currently `20%` for monsters level `30` and increases gradually to reach `35%` for monsters level `120 ~ 140`.

items.content: Increased the 1v1 Exp and Drop bonus of new levels. It was `35%` before and is now ranging from `90.4423%` at `141` to `102.5%` at `160`. (At levels `161` and higher, remains `102.5%`.)
1v1 Exp and Drop bonus are based on monster level. Meaning that you can take advantage of this exp increase as soon as you are strong enough to fight monsters level 141 and above.
